Package edu.salle.url.maze

Class MazeBuilder

java.lang.Object
edu.salle.url.maze.MazeBuilder
public final class MazeBuilder extends Object
Helper class to generate instances of the Maze class in an abstract way, following the Builder software design pattern.

It provides self-returning methods (for chaining) that allow for the configuration of the following parameters:

  • Maze size (required, set by default) - rows x columns, both being between 5 and 255.
  • Seed (fully optional) - a long integer representing a specific configuration, can be used to "disable" randomness.
  • MazeSolver (required, NOT set by default) - a class implementing the corresponding interface, which will be used to solve the problem.
  • Maze generation style (required, chosen at the end) - one of the provided algorithms for maze generation, chosen by either calling the "buildDungeonMaze" or "buildCaveMaze" method at the end of the configuration process./li>

  • Constructor Details

    • MazeBuilder

      public MazeBuilder()
      The only constructor for the MazeBuilder class. It defaults to the following parameters:
      • Maze Size: 16x16
      • Random seed

  • Method Details

    • setMazeColumns

      public MazeBuilder setMazeColumns(int mazeColumns)
      Setter for part of the Maze size parameter.
      Parameters:
      mazeColumns - The number of columns the maze grid will have, must be between 5 and 255 (both included)
      Returns:
      The current MazeBuilder instance (i.e. "this"), for method chaining purposes.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of rows is not between 5 and 255.

    • setMazeRows

      public MazeBuilder setMazeRows(int mazeRows)
      Setter for part of the Maze size parameter.
      Parameters:
      mazeRows - The number of rows the maze grid will have, must be between 5 and 255 (both included)
      Returns:
      The current MazeBuilder instance (i.e. "this"), for method chaining purposes.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of rows is not between 5 and 255.

    • setSeed

      public MazeBuilder setSeed(long seed)
      Setter for the seed parameter, which can be used to control randomness.
      Parameters:
      seed - The seed parameter, which determines how the inputs are generated.
      Returns:
      The current MazeBuilder instance (i.e. "this"), for method chaining purposes.

    • setMazeSolver

      public MazeBuilder setMazeSolver(MazeSolver mazeSolver)
      Setter for the MazeSolver.
      Parameters:
      mazeSolver - An instance of any class implementing the MazeSolver interface, which will be used to solve the Maze problem.
      Returns:
      The current MazeBuilder instance (i.e. "this"), for method chaining purposes.

    • buildDungeonMaze

      public Maze buildDungeonMaze()
      Method that builds an instance of the Maze class with the Dungeon style and the previously set parameters, returning the result.
      Returns:
      The created Maze instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a MazeSolver wasn't chosen.

    • buildCaveMaze

      public Maze buildCaveMaze()
      Method that builds an instance of the Maze class with the Cave style and the previously set parameters, returning the result.
      Returns:
      The created Maze instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if a MazeSolver wasn't chosen.
